T02D3263:18b-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam /
T02D3263:18b-3: gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3263:18b-4: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i
T02D3263:18b-5: rjes thogs la padma dkar po'i steng du nyi ma
T02D3263:18b-6: la yi ge h'um nag po yongs su gyur pa
T02D3263:18b-7: las me tog aa ta si dang mtshungs par gyur
T02D3263:18b-8: ba'i bcom ldan 'das dpal dang ldan pa'i khro bo
T02D3263:19a-1: gzhan ni mi g-yo ba ste /
T02D3263:19a-3: spyan g-yo bar mdzad pa mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal ches 'jigs par gyur pa /
T02D3263:19a-4: man mgal bsdams pa'i tshems gtsigs pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3263:19a-5: dbu la mgo bo'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3263:19a-6: spyan gnyis shin tu dmar ba /
T02D3263:19a-7: g-yas pas ni ral gri bsnams shing phyag g-yon pas sdig mdzub dang zhags pa thugs kar ro //
T02D3263:19a-8: sbrul dkar po gshal dag byed du mdzad pa /
T02D3263:19a-9: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan pa /
T02D3263:19a-10: rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa'i rgyan mnga' ba //
T02D3263:19a-11: zhabs g-yas pa sa la btsugs shing g-yon pa cung zad smad pa /
T02D3263:19a-12: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya zhing /
T02D3263:19a-13: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom
T02D3263:19a-14: pa sngon du 'gro bas mi bskyod pa cod pan
T02D3263:19a-15: gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3263:19a-16: de'i rjes la bzlas pa ni /
T02D3263:19a-17: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3263:19a-18: khro bo chen po gtum po'i sgrub thabs so //
